index_service_title: Service of selection of arbitrage deals
index_service_progress_item_1_descriptio: arbitrage pairs right now with a profit of 1-25%
index_arbitration_why_us_title_1: We all know that markets are volatile
index_arbitration_why_us_title_2: and on one exchange the token rate can rise faster than on another and the difference between exchanges can reach 50% in a circle
index_arbitration_why_us_description: It's hard to track the difference by hand, and that's why we've developed the CoinHunterBot arbitrage bot - to save you time.
index_arbitration_key_benefits_descripti: This is the easiest way to find profitable bundles between exchanges in real time.
Also you have a unique opportunity to receive notifications in JSON format to the address you need - this will allow you to customize your own bot for trading!
index_all_in_telegram_exchanges_subtitle: Setting up exchanges directly in the bot: Binance, Bybit, Bittrex, Hitbtc, Poloniex, KuCoin, Gate.io, OKX, Huobi, Exmo
index_all_in_telegram_card_2_subtitle_1: Receive arbitrage bundles to your Telegram with a delay of only 2 seconds
index_all_in_telegram_card_4_subtitle_1: A handy guide to arbitrage trading
index_all_in_telegram_card_5_subtitle_1: Connection to the bot in the personal cabinet on the site after subscribing.
index_all_in_telegram_card_5_subtitle_2: You can use the bot immediately after registration
index_access_arbitrage_tarif_provide_7: Notifications of available profitable bundles for inter-exchange arbitrage
index_access_arbitrage_tarif_provide_9: Getting spreads in JSON format for your bot
index_how_bot_works_card_1_description_1: CoinHunter does not work with your money, we do not connect via API
index_how_bot_works_card_1_description_2: to your exchanges balances, you do not connect your wallets anywhere. A fully manual bot that runs in the cloud to keep your money safe.
index_how_bot_works_card_2_description_1: For example, you bought LTC at $72, its value started to rise. Let's say you want to hold it until $77. While the coin is growing, you add it to the bot to track the difference between exchanges, and you can add and remove any coin traded on the exchanges at any time.
index_how_bot_works_card_2_description_2: Next, you choose the percentage of the spread. As soon as the difference reaches the set percentage you will receive a notification in Telegram.
index_how_bot_works_card_3_description_1: Have you dreamed of passive income? Our tools will help you enjoy your vacation while the bot searches for favorable spreads. And as a pleasant bonus - we really do have the most favorable offer on the market
index_how_bot_works_card_4_description_1: You save time to search for spreads and get favorable offers according to the specified filters in a convenient online format.
index_success_form_description: We have already received them and passed them on to our experts. They will contact you to help answer any questions you may have. See you soon!
index_notification_settings_error_descri: Unforeseen circumstances can trip us all up. Please try submitting your question again and check your internet connection.
